ygData.subject: RE: RE: Hey this sounded interesting.. *Time to KABOING ??*
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You re assuming that you are of a level to group with a level 29 cleric. Let s go with what you said above. if you dont have a cleric you should expect to
ygData.messageBody:
> group playing in lower guk. bard dies. cleric
> resses bard. have a nice day.
>
> if you don't have a cleric in your group in lower
> guk (or anywhere for that matter in high level
> dungeons), then you should expect to die often.

You're assuming that you are of a level to group with
a level 29 cleric. Let's go with what you said above.
"if you dont have a cleric you should
expect to die often." (paraphrased of course)

So, because there's no cleric in my group, or because
I'm not high enough level to group with a level 29
cleric - I should be expected to run through 6+ zones
back to my corpse while a wizard can bind himself right
outside of the dungeon or place we're in? I still don't
see the logic. All classes should be able to be bound
in the same places as any other class can. That's all
there is to it.
